ygData.subject: Re: Unearned Faction (was The surefire way for a bard to avoid  being a mobs m ain target)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Strange it only happens to bards then. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity. GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Sep 24/99, Zoie <valkry@...> wrote:
> From: Zoie <valkry@...>
>

> I think this Verant's punishment/reward for passive neglect...you were
> there when a poor knoll pup was cruelly killed and did not try to stop
> the attack, therefore you are as guilty as the actual murder.

Strange it only happens to bards then.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
